   contain the root `toctree` directive.

blacklist_server Documentation
==============================

Welcome to the **blacklist_server** project documentation.

This project is structured in 2 main modules:
- `server`: HTTP server, manages logic of server as well as traffic detection algorithms & blacklist services.
- `client`: Client, used to simulate different kinds of traffic.

Here you can find the automaticly generated documentation for the project.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Main modules

   server
   logger
   utils
   http_handler
   metrics
   detection
   modules
